question: Mutawatir Ahadith
answer:
QUESTION

Please could you email me all the Mutawatir Ahadith. I believe there are 300-500, that is the total including Ma'nawi and Lafzi ones.
I also believe, if I am correct that there are around 25 Lafzi Mutawatir Ahadith.
Please could you highlight the Lafzi ones.



ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful  

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

You may refer to the book titled “Nazhmul Mutanaathir Minal Hadithil Mutawaatir” by Shaykh Muhammad Bin Ja’far Al-Kattaani (1345ah). He has gathered in this book the ahadith that are Mutawaatir, both lafzan and Ma’nan. It can be easily purchased over the net from Dar Al-Kutob Al-ilmiyah (sales@al-ilmiyah).

And Allah knows best

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
